abstract: The broad market declined modestly, but the Nasdaq composite index, which is heavily laden with technology stocks, managed a slight gain.
snippet: The broad market declined modestly, but the Nasdaq composite index, which is heavily laden with technology stocks, managed a slight gain.
lead_paragraph: It was a so-so week for the stock market. The broad market declined modestly, but the Nasdaq composite index, which is heavily laden with technology stocks, managed a slight gain.

headline.main: A Middling Week, but a Good One for 2008
headline.print_headline: A Middling Week, but a Good One for 2008
